title: Unchained alistar i cannot redeem him ;/
body: This is what it says and i subscribed and everything riot games plz help me redeem the unchained alistar ;/

replies.body: Submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll add it for you.
Player Support uses support tickets to help with various issues, such as account questions.
there we go i sumbitted one i hope it works
It might take a day or so for them to get around to it, but you'll get it.
